nodes.text: Solu Five was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories along several profitable hyperlanes. During the Galactic War, the planet was represented in the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic by Senator Grom Zian.
Solu Five was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a press release that Trooper players receive if they choose to expose Senator Zian's treason.
